message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item, but a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects its true value while allowing us to cover our costs and ensure sustainability. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your positive response.
